SELECT hss.id id, hss.student_id studentid, hss.homework_id homeworkid, hss.section_id sectionid, hss.audio_path audiopath, hss.text studenttext, hss.score studentscore, hd.homework_type homeworktype, hd.section_detail_id sectiondetailid, sd.audio_path standeraudiopath, sd.text standertext, sd.m_audio_path standermaudiopath, sd.w_audio_path standerwaudiopath, sd.word_mean standerwordmean FROM ( SELECT * FROM xl_homework_student_score WHERE homework_id = #{homeworkId} and student_id = #{studentId} ) hss LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM xl_homework_detail WHERE homework_id = #{homeworkId} ) hd ON hss.section_id = hd.id LEFT JOIN xl_section_detail sd ON hd.section_detail_id = sd.id
